instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00939: What is 820-00939? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message:
mac mini 2018 stuck on apple logo without loading bar.
try DFU restore its pass ok but still stuck on the logo.
try from external ssd os but the same.
was try Diagnostic but no errors.
recovery mode, download the recovery ok but also stuck on logo.
board battery 2.8v
what else can it be?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message: Did you try to boot in Safe mode?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message:
yes but still stuck on apple logo, its stuck when the loading bar should appear.. but you see just the apple logo.
but when i do restore with DFU there is the loading bar but after that its start over and stuck on the apple logo

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message: Remove the CMOS cell and connect power.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message: I was take out the CMOS(battery) , connected the core, turn in on, but the same stuck at apple logo, I was also tried to do internal recovery but it was struck on 99% loading

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message: Try to install original macOS version; start with SHIFT + OPTION + COMMAND + R.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message:
i was tried but the same, its download the interne recovery and when its finish and upload its stuck on apple logo(no bar loading appear)
very wierd

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00939</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mac mini stuck on apple logo
threads.message:
Check if is possible to install Windows, or Linux.
Or test with some Live version, at least.
